recommended_degree: Administrasi, Psikologi, Manajemen, Teknik  Industri, Statistik (Sarjana)
job_description:
Human Capital Intern supports daily HR administrative activities, including managing documents, handling basic recruitment tasks, and assisting in employee services and internal HR coordination.
Main Responsibilities:
•	Assist with HR administration, filing, and updating employee documents.
•	Support basic recruitment tasks such as posting vacancies, initial CV screening, and scheduling interviews.
•	Help prepare onboarding materials and simple training documentation.
•	Assist with employee inquiries related to forms and HR procedures.
•	Support small HR projects, including data updates and documentation tasks.

Note:
This position required English Communication skills
Open for any major
